nodes.description: A formal, mandated period of rest and reflection after a major inquiry cycle. All forward progress on new features is halted to allow for subconscious memory consolidation, strategic integration of learnings, and team recovery.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Fills the stock of 'Team Resilience,' 'Strategic Cohesion,' and 'Integrated Knowledge.' Depletes the stock of 'Process Debt' and 'Burnout.'
Increases the inflow of 'Rest' and 'Subconscious Processing.'
It is a deliberate halt to the outflow of 'Energy' into new feature work.
Not applicable. It is an internal state-change for the system.
The node is the variable 'System Reboot.' It is a policy that prioritizes long-term health over short-term output.
Strengthens the information connector between 'Past Learnings' and 'Future Strategy' by providing the time and space for synthesis to occur.
It is a Valve that temporarily shuts off the 'Inflow of New Work.'
The 'Duration of the Consolidation Period' is the fixed parameter.

It is a Balancing Loop (B) for 'System Sustainability.' (Goal: A Sustainable Pace) -> A Gap is created by accumulated burnout and process debt -> A consolidation period is initiated -> The team rests and fixes systemic issues -> The system returns to a healthy state -> The Gap closes.
Leverages a Delay (the rest period) as its primary mechanism for subconscious memory consolidation and insight generation.
The system boundary is the team's own socio-technical health.
The goal is to 'Pay Down Debt' and 'Sharpen the Saw.'

nodes.name: The Handoff Ritual
nodes.description: A formal meeting to ensure shared understanding. In T5, it ensures the plan is clear before execution. In T6, it serves as a 'kickoff' ritual to confirm alignment one last time before work begins.
inputs: A completed technical specification or plan
outputs: A shared understanding of the plan

secondaryApplications.context: Serves as the formal kickoff for the execution phase, ensuring alignment before work begins.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Fills the stock of 'Shared Understanding' between the planning and execution teams.
It is the primary inflow of 'Tacit Knowledge' and 'The 'Why' Behind the Plan.'
Reduces the outflow of 'Time' and 'Quality' that is lost to misunderstandings and rework during the execution phase.
It is a bridge from the Source Cloud of 'The Planning Team's Minds' to the Sink Cloud of 'The Execution Team's Minds.'
The node is the variable 'Ambiguity Detector.' Its function is to surface all the unstated assumptions in the plan.
Creates a high-bandwidth, social, synchronous information connector between the two teams, supplementing the asynchronous, written spec.
It is the final Valve on the 'Inflow of Work into Execution (Tool 6).' The policy is: 'Execution cannot begin until all questions are answered and shared understanding is confirmed.'
The 'Completed Specification Document' is the parameter that serves as the agenda for the ritual.

It is a rapid Balancing Loop (B) for 'Clarity.' (Goal: A Clear Plan) -> A Gap is created by an ambiguous part of the spec -> An engineer asks a question -> The planner clarifies the intent -> The shared understanding is increased -> The Gap closes.
It is a process designed to eliminate the long and costly Delay between a misunderstanding and its discovery.
The system boundary is the social-cognitive space between the two teams. The ritual's goal is to merge their mental models.
The goal is to achieve 'Flawless Knowledge Transfer.'

nodes.name: Run a Portfolio Review
nodes.description: A strategic leadership ritual to evaluate a portfolio of potential projects against the organization's capacity and long-term goals, resulting in a prioritized roadmap for the upcoming cycle.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Manages the stock of 'Strategic Alignment' across the entire organization.
It is the primary inflow of 'Approved Projects' into the organization's work pipeline.
Reduces the outflow of 'Resources' wasted on low-value or misaligned projects.
Draws from the Source Cloud of 'Potential Initiatives.' The approved projects flow to the Sink Cloud of 'The Quarterly Roadmap.'
The node is the variable 'Strategic Value Calculator.' It scores potential projects against the organization's high-level goals (OKRs).
Creates a strong information connector from the 'CEO's Strategic Goals' to the 'Work Being Done by the Teams.'
It is the main Valve on the 'Inflow of New Projects.' The policy is: 'Only projects that directly serve our strategic goals and fit within our capacity will be approved.'
The 'Organizational OKRs' and the 'Total Available Capacity (Budget)' are the fixed parameters for the review.

It is the highest-level Balancing Loop (B) for 'Organizational Focus.' (Goal: A Focused Organization) -> A Gap is created by too many competing priorities -> The portfolio review forces a prioritization -> Low-value projects are cut -> The organization becomes more focused -> The Gap closes.
The quarterly cadence creates a planned Delay to ensure strategic decisions are made deliberately, not reactively.
The system boundary is the entire organization and its portfolio of work.
The goal is to 'Do the Right Work' (not just 'do the work right').

nodes.name: Use the Diagnostic Hub
nodes.description: An intervention for when a team is stuck, arguing, or lost. It is a structured process to pause the work, diagnose the current context (e.g., using Cynefin), and deliberately choose the appropriate tool or pathway to move forward.
inputs: A state of process friction or confusion
outputs: A diagnosis of the current context

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Depletes the stock of 'Process Confusion ('Disorder')' and fills the stock of 'Process Clarity.'
Increases the inflow of 'Appropriate Actions.'
Reduces the outflow of 'Time' and 'Morale' lost to unproductive arguments and circular discussions.
Draws from the Source Cloud of 'A State of Being Stuck.' The chosen action flows to the Sink Cloud of 'Productive Work.'
The node is the variable 'Context Diagnoser.' It uses the Cynefin framework to calculate the nature of the problem (Clear, Complicated, Complex, Chaotic).
Creates an information connector from the 'Nature of the Problem' to the 'Correct Process to Use.'
It is a Valve on the 'Inflow of Inappropriate Actions.' The policy is: 'First, diagnose the context. Then, act.'
The 'Cynefin Framework' itself is the fixed parameter (the diagnostic model).

It is the intervention that restarts a stalled Balancing Loop (B). (Goal: Make Progress) -> A Gap is created by being stuck -> The Diagnostic Hub is used -> The correct process is chosen -> The team gets unstuck and starts making progress again -> The Gap begins to close.
It is an action to end the Delay of being stuck in a state of indecision or unproductive conflict.
The system boundary is the team's own metacognitive process.
The goal is to achieve 'Process Self-Regulation.'

nodes.name: Initial Thought Record
nodes.description: A private exercise to capture anxieties about a new project, identify the underlying cognitive distortion (e.g., catastrophizing), and write a more balanced alternative.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Builds the stock of 'Project Clarity' by depleting the initial stock of 'Vague Anxiety.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Builds 'Hypothesis Precision.'
Builds 'Scope Definition.'
Builds 'Creative Intent.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Opens the inflow to 'Focused Action' by converting anxious energy into a structured starting point.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Starts the inflow of 'Testable Predictions.'
Starts the inflow of 'Backlog Items.'
Starts the inflow of 'Creative Exploration.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Drains the stock of 'Procrastination Fuel' (the overwhelming feeling of not knowing where to start).

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Drains 'Fear of a Flawed Hypothesis.'
Drains 'Fear of Stakeholder Disapproval.'
Drains 'The Terror of the Blank Canvas.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: The 'Vague Anxiety' comes from a Source Cloud called 'Future Uncertainty.' The clarified thoughts flow towards a Sink Cloud called 'Project Kickoff.'
The node is the variable 'Anxiety-to-Action Converter.' It calculates the gap between a feared outcome and a more probable, manageable outcome.
Creates a connector from 'Feeling of Overwhelm' to 'Act of Writing,' turning a paralyzing emotion into a trigger for productive action.
Acts as the initial Valve on the 'Project Momentum' inflow. The policy is: 'Do not proceed until initial anxieties are made explicit and reframed.'
The fixed 'Thought Record Template' (Situation, Thought, Distortion, Reframe) is the parameter that structures the analysis.
Creates a Balancing Loop (B) for 'Motivation.' `High Anxiety -> Use Thought Record -> Anxiety Decreases -> Motivation to Start Increases -> The Gap between 'Stuck' and 'Started' closes.`
Reduces the Delay between project conception and the first productive action.
Expands the project boundary to include the practitioner's own initial psychological state as a formal, addressable part of the project's kickoff phase.
The goal is to achieve 'Actionable Serenity'--a state of calm focus that enables the project to begin with momentum.

nodes.name: Define the Plan as an Experiment
nodes.description: A checklist that reframes a project plan as a testable hypothesis, lowering the stakes and combating perfectionism.
outputs: A plan framed as a falsifiable experiment

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Depletes the stock of 'Attachment to the Plan' and increases the stock of 'Psychological Flexibility.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Depletes 'Dogmatism.'
Depletes 'Commitment to a Fixed Scope.'
Depletes 'Rigid Adherence to the Initial Vision.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Opens the inflow of 'Validated Learning' by framing every outcome (even 'failure') as valuable data.
Drains the stock of 'Fear of Failure' by redefining 'failure' as 'a surprising result.'
The 'Plan' comes from a Source Cloud of 'Assumptions.' The 'Results' flow to a Sink Cloud of 'Organizational Knowledge.'
The node is the variable 'Success Re-definer.' It calculates success not as 'Did the plan work?' but as 'Did we learn something valuable?'
Creates a connector from 'Unexpected Outcome' to 'Learning Event,' rather than to 'Project Failure.'
Acts as the Valve on the 'Decision to Pivot' outflow. The policy is: 'If the experiment invalidates the hypothesis, this valve opens easily.'
The 'Falsifiable Hypothesis' written in the checklist is the fixed parameter against which results are measured.
Creates a Reinforcing Loop (R) for 'Adaptability.' `Frame as Experiment -> Less Fear of Failure -> More Willingness to Try Bold Experiments -> More Learning -> Better Future Experiments.`
Reduces the Delay between receiving disconfirming data and making a strategic pivot.
Redraws the boundary of the project from 'a plan to be executed' to 'an experiment to be run,' making uncertainty an explicit part of the system.
The goal is to maximize 'Rate of Learning' rather than 'Fidelity to Plan.'

nodes.name: Idea Labeling
nodes.description: During brainstorming, participants label their own ideas (e.g., 'Wild Idea', 'Safe Bet') to give themselves permission to generate non-perfect options and reduce self-judgment.
outputs: A more diverse portfolio of ideas

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Increases the stock of 'Idea Diversity' and 'Environment of Open Communication.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Increases the stock of 'Unconventional Hypotheses.'
Increases the stock of 'Disruptive Business Models.'
Increases the stock of 'Avant-Garde Concepts.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Dramatically increases the inflow of 'Unfiltered Ideas' into the brainstorm.
Reduces the outflow of 'Novel Ideas' that are normally lost due to self-censorship.
Ideas come from the Source Cloud of 'Individual Creativity' and flow to the Sink Cloud of the 'Options Portfolio.'
The node is the variable 'Permission Grantor.' It calculates the 'cost' of sharing a wild idea as near-zero.
Weakens the information connector between 'Idea Generation' and 'Immediate Judgment,' allowing the former to operate more freely.
Opens the Valve on the 'Inflow of Wild Ideas.' The policy is: 'All ideas, especially those labeled 'Wild,' are welcome.'
The 'Set of Labels' ('Wild Idea', 'Safe Bet', etc.) is the fixed parameter that provides the structure for this permission.
Creates a Reinforcing Loop (R) for 'Creativity.' `Labeling -> Less Fear of Judgment -> More Wild Ideas Shared -> More Creative Connections Made -> More Confidence to Share Wild Ideas.`
Not directly applicable.
Expands the boundary of 'acceptable contributions' to explicitly include ideas that are playful, half-baked, or seemingly absurd.
The goal is to maximize 'Quantity and Diversity of Options,' not immediate quality.

nodes.name: Practice Mindfulness Trigger
nodes.description: A CBT-based technique to interrupt unhelpful habits (like multitasking) by setting a conscious intention to pause and gently return to the primary task when a trigger is noticed.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Builds the stock of 'Sustained Attention' (Focus).

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Builds 'Experimental Rigor.'
Builds 'Developer Productivity.'
Builds 'Deep Immersion' (Flow State).

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Increases the inflow to the 'Time Spent on Task' stock.
Reduces the outflow of 'Cognitive Resources' lost to context-switching.
The 'Distractions' come from a Source Cloud called 'The Environment.' The regained focus flows to the Sink Cloud of 'Completed Work.'
The node is the variable 'Pattern Interrupt.' It is a conditional rule: IF (Distraction is Noticed) THEN (Execute 'Return to Task' Action).
Creates a new information connector from 'Noticing a Distraction' to 'A Moment of Mindful Awareness,' rather than to 'Automatic Engagement with Distraction.'
Acts as the Valve on the 'Outflow of Attention.' The policy is: 'When a distraction is detected, briefly close this valve and redirect flow back to the primary task.'
The 'Chosen Trigger' (e.g., 'the act of opening a new tab') is the fixed parameter the system is trained to detect.
Creates a Balancing Loop (B) for 'Focus.' (Goal: Stay on Task) -> A Gap is created by a Distraction -> Attention Drifts -> Trigger is Noticed -> Action is Taken to Return to Task -> The Gap closes.
Reduces the Delay between the moment a distraction occurs and the moment of returning to the primary task.
Expands the boundary of the 'work system' to include the practitioner's own attentional habits as a manageable component.
The goal is to achieve 'Effortless Re-focusing.'

nodes.name: Identify Cognitive Distortions in Feedback
nodes.description: A structured exercise where a user reviews their emotional reaction to feedback against a checklist of common cognitive distortions (e.g., Personalization).

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Builds 'Actionable Insight,' depletes 'Emotional Reactivity.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Depletes the stock of 'Confounding Variables' by separating the signal (valid critique) from the noise (emotional reaction).
Increases the stock of 'Argumentative Robustness' by identifying which feedback points to a genuine logical flaw.
Builds a stock of 'Aesthetic Clarity' by filtering feedback to find the core issue affecting the work's impact.
Converts a stock of 'Raw User Complaints' into a stock of 'Prioritized Usability Issues.'
Depletes the stock of 'Interpersonal Misunderstanding' by clarifying the intent behind the feedback.
Builds the learner's stock of 'Metacognitive Awareness.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Controls the inflow to the 'Actionable Insight' stock. It acts as a quality filter on the 'Inflow of Raw Feedback.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Regulates the inflow of 'Valid Error Reports' into the debugging process.
Governs the inflow of 'Constructive Criticism' into the revision plan.
Controls the inflow of 'Usable Design Suggestions.'
Manages the inflow of 'Validated Problems' into the product backlog.
Facilitates the inflow of 'Reconciliatory Understanding.'
Opens the inflow for 'Student Self-Correction.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Dramatically increases the outflow from the 'Emotional Reactivity' stock. By labeling a thought as a 'distortion,' it allows that thought to be drained from the system.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Increases the outflow of 'Attachment to a Pet Hypothesis.'
Drains the 'Defensiveness' that prevents a scholar from engaging with valid counterarguments.
Reduces the outflow of 'Creative Energy' lost to self-doubt.
Increases the outflow of 'Wasted Time' spent debating personalized feedback.
Drains the 'Resentment' that can build up from perceived personal attacks.
Increases the outflow of 'Fixed Mindset' beliefs in the learner.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: The 'Raw Feedback' inflow comes from a Source Cloud called 'External Perspectives.' The 'Emotional Reactivity' that is drained goes to a Sink Cloud called 'Non-Actionable Thoughts.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The source is the 'Peer Reviewer Pool'; the sink is 'Dismissed Anomalies.'
The source is the 'Scholarly Community'; the sink is 'Ad Hominem Arguments.'
The source is the 'Audience'; the sink is 'Subjective Taste.'
The source is the 'User Base'; the sink is 'Feature Requests Outside the Scope.'
The source is the 'Community Council'; the sink is 'Unresolved Grievances.'
The source is the 'Peer Critiquer'; the sink is 'Unconstructive Comments.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: The node itself functions as a critical auxiliary variable: 'The Distortion Filter.' It is a calculation that takes the 'Raw Feedback' and the 'User's Emotional State' as inputs and outputs a 'Filtered Feedback Signal.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The variable is 'Signal-to-Noise Ratio.'
The variable is 'Logical Validity Check.'
The variable is 'Aesthetic Intent Filter.'
The variable is 'Problem vs. Solution Filter' (separating user problems from their suggested solutions).
The variable is 'Principle vs. Preference Check.'
The variable is 'Growth Mindset Converter.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Creates a new, powerful information connector from the 'Stock of Emotional Reactivity' to the 'Valve on the Feedback Inflow.' Previously, high reactivity would shut the valve (defensiveness). Now, high reactivity *signals the need to apply the distortion filter*, keeping the valve open.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Connects 'Surprise at Anomaly' to 'Increased Methodological Scrutiny' instead of 'Rejection of Data.'
Connects 'Discomfort with Counterargument' to 'Steelmanning the Opposition' instead of 'Dismissal.'
Connects 'Pain of Harsh Critique' to 'Search for the Kernel of Truth' instead of 'Creative Block.'
Connects 'Frustration with User Complaint' to 'Root Cause Analysis' instead of 'Building the Wrong Feature.'
Connects 'Feeling of Being Attacked' to 'Request for Clarification.'
Connects 'Student's Discouragement' to 'Focus on a Single, Actionable Step.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Acts as the Valve that regulates the inflow of feedback into the 'Actionable Insight' stock. The 'policy' of this valve is: 'Only allow feedback that has been filtered for cognitive distortions to pass.'

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The valve's policy is 'Only accept bug reports that are reproducible and specific.'
The valve's policy is 'Only engage with critiques of the argument, not the author.'
The valve's policy is 'Only implement feedback that aligns with the core aesthetic intent.'
The valve's policy is 'Prioritize feedback that describes a problem, not a solution.'
The valve's policy is 'Listen to all feedback, but only act on that which aligns with our shared values.'
The valve's policy is 'Convert all feedback into a single, forward-looking 'What if you tried...?' suggestion.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: The 'List of Cognitive Distortions' (from `reference.json`) acts as the fixed parameter for this node. The system's effectiveness is tuned by the quality and clarity of this list.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The parameter is the 'Checklist of Common Experimental Biases.'
The parameter is the 'List of Logical Fallacies.'
The parameter is the 'Set of Core Design Principles' against which critique is measured.
The parameter is the 'Definition of a 'P0' Bug' (the rule for what counts as critical).
The parameter is the 'Community's Code of Conduct.'
The parameter is the 'Learning Rubric.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Creates a powerful Balancing Loop (B) that stabilizes 'Self-Esteem.' The loop is: `(Goal: Stable Self-Esteem) -> A Gap is created by Negative Feedback -> Emotional Reactivity Increases -> Distortion Filter is Applied -> Feedback is Depersonalized -> Emotional Reactivity Decreases -> The Gap closes.` It breaks the reinforcing 'shame spiral' loop.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Creates a balancing loop for 'Scientific Objectivity.'
Creates a balancing loop for 'Intellectual Humility.'
Creates a balancing loop for 'Creative Confidence.'
Creates a balancing loop for 'Customer Empathy.'
Creates a balancing loop for 'Mutual Respect.'
Creates a balancing loop for 'Learner Resilience.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Intentionally introduces a Delay between receiving feedback and responding to it. This delay is crucial; it creates the time and space needed to perform the cognitive filtering, allowing the ECN to override the immediate, emotional limbic response.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The delay between getting peer review comments and writing the response letter.
The 'let the draft sit for a week' rule before revising.
The time between a harsh critique and returning to the studio.
The delay between a customer support firestorm and the product roadmap meeting.
The 'take a breath before you speak' rule in a tense meeting.
The time between a student submitting work and the teacher grading it.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Redraws the system boundary. Before, the boundary was around the work itself. This node expands the boundary to include the creator's own mind and emotional state as part of the system to be analyzed and improved.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The boundary expands from the experiment to include the experimenter's own biases.
The boundary expands from the text to include the reader's interpretation.
The boundary expands from the artifact to include the artist's intention.
The boundary expands from the product to include the team's morale.
The boundary expands from the action to include the actor's inner state.
The boundary expands from the student's work to include the student's mindset.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: The explicit goal of this node is to 'Transform Criticism into Actionable Data.' It serves the higher-level goal of the balancing loop, which is to maintain a stable sense of self-worth and competence in the face of challenges.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: The goal is 'Rigor and Objectivity.'
The goal is 'A Stronger Argument.'
The goal is 'Greater Aesthetic Impact.'
The goal is 'A More Valuable Product.'
The goal is 'Restored Relationship.'
The goal is 'Deeper Learning.'

nodes.name: Cognitive Reframing
nodes.description: A simple 'thought record' exercise that guides a user to challenge a distorted thought about feedback and formulate a more balanced, helpful alternative.
outputs: A reframed, actionable interpretation of feedback

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Builds 'Resilience' and 'Actionable Revisions.'
Opens the inflow to the 'Revision Plan' stock by converting a paralyzing thought into a concrete next step.
Drains the stock of 'Negative Emotional Energy' (e.g., shame, anger) by challenging the thought that fuels it.
The 'Distorted Thought' comes from a Source Cloud of 'Automatic Beliefs.' The 'Reframed Thought' flows to the Sink Cloud of 'Constructive Action.'
The node is the variable 'Evidence-Based Challenger.' It calculates the validity of a thought by comparing it against objective evidence.
Creates a connector from 'Negative Feeling' to 'Act of Inquiry' ('Is this thought actually true?'), rather than to 'Behavioral Reaction' (e.g., lashing out, shutting down).
Acts as the Valve on the 'Outflow of Motivation.' The policy is: 'Challenge and reframe any thought that threatens to shut down this valve.'
The 'Thought Record Template' is the fixed parameter that structures the reframing process.

Creates a Reinforcing Loop (R) for 'Growth Mindset.' `Reframe a Negative Thought -> Feel Better -> More Able to Act on Feedback -> See Positive Results -> Belief in Ability to Grow is Strengthened -> Easier to Reframe Next Time.`
Reduces the Delay between feeling a negative emotion and taking constructive action.
The boundary explicitly includes one's own thoughts not as 'reality' but as 'internal events' that can be observed, questioned, and changed.
The goal is to achieve 'Objective Clarity' in the face of emotionally charged information.

nodes.name: Schedule the Learning
nodes.description: A behavioral commitment technique where the final output of a retrospective is a scheduled meeting at the start of the next project to review the playbook.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Increases the stock of 'Transferred Knowledge' within the organization.

domainSpecificTranslations.expression: Builds the stock of 'Replicated Methodologies.'
Builds the stock of 'Institutional Memory.'
Builds the stock of 'Shared Studio Practices.'
Builds the stock of 'Adopted Best Practices.'
Builds the stock of 'Living Traditions.'
Builds the stock of 'A Continuously Improving Curriculum.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Creates a forced inflow of 'Past Learnings' into the 'Next Project's Plan.'
Dramatically reduces the outflow of 'Repository of Reusable Knowledge' (lessons that are learned but quickly forgotten).
The 'Playbook' comes from the Source Cloud of 'Past Projects.' The scheduled review acts on the Sink Cloud of 'Future Projects.'
The node is the variable 'Forgetting Curve Interrupter.' It is a time-based rule: `SCHEDULE ('Review Playbook') at T+1 (start of next project).`
Creates a formal information connector between the output of one project cycle and the input of the next.
Acts as the Valve on the 'Inflow of Repeated Mistakes.' The policy is: 'This valve is closed by a mandatory review of past lessons.'
The 'Calendar Invitation' itself is the fixed parameter that ensures the action occurs.

Creates a Reinforcing Loop (R) for 'Organizational Improvement.' `Schedule Learning -> Review Past Lessons -> Avoid Old Mistakes -> Better Project Outcome -> More Valuable Lessons to Synthesize -> More Motivation to Schedule the Next Learning Review.`
Bridges the Delay (the time between projects) where organizational knowledge is typically lost.
Expands the boundary of a 'project' to include a formal handoff to the *next* project, linking them in a continuous chain of learning.
The goal is to create a 'Learning Organization.'

nodes.name: Team Belief Audit
nodes.description: A facilitated exercise where a team identifies and challenges its unstated, shared, and potentially unhelpful beliefs about its own work process.

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Depletes the stock of 'Unproductive Team Norms' and builds the stock of 'Process Awareness.'
Opens the inflow of 'Process Experiments' into the team's workflow.
Drains the stock of 'Interpersonal Friction' by addressing its root cause.
The 'Unhelpful Belief' comes from a Source Cloud of 'Implicit Team Culture.' The 'New Belief' flows to the Sink Cloud of 'Explicit Team Agreements.'
The node is the variable 'Belief-to-Behavior Bridge.' It calculates the causal link between a shared team thought and a recurring negative outcome.
Creates a connector from 'Recurring Process Failure' to 'Inquiry into Team's Mental Model,' rather than to 'Blaming Individuals.'
Acts as the Valve on the 'Inflow of Habitual Behavior.' The policy is: 'Once an unhelpful belief is identified, this valve is adjusted to favor a new, more productive behavior.'
The 'Facilitator's Probing Question' ('Is this belief serving us?') is the parameter that initiates the audit.

Creates a Balancing Loop (B) for 'Team Effectiveness.' (Goal: Effective Process) -> A Gap is created by a Recurring Problem -> Belief Audit is Conducted -> Unhelpful Belief is Identified and Challenged -> New Process is Adopted -> The Problem is Reduced -> The Gap closes.
Reduces the Delay between a team recognizing a recurring problem and addressing its systemic, cultural root.
Expands the boundary of the 'process' to include the team's shared psychology and unstated assumptions as a manageable part of the system.
The goal is to achieve 'Collective Self-Regulation.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Increases the stock of 'Communicative Clarity' and 'Embodied Understanding.'
Increases the inflow of 'Tacit Knowledge' into the explicit, structured plan.
Drains the stock of 'Hidden Assumptions' by forcing them to be physically enacted.
The 'Internal Mental Model' is the Source Cloud. The 'Refined Plan' is the Sink Cloud.
The node is the variable 'Embodied-to-Symbolic Translator.' It converts the information expressed in gesture into verbal and written refinements.
Creates a powerful information connector from the Sensorimotor System to the Language Network, creating a feedback loop between doing and describing.
Opens the Valve on the 'Inflow of Structural Insights.' The policy is: 'Physical enactment of an idea reveals its structural flaws.'
Not directly applicable. The body itself is the 'parameter.'

Creates a rapid Balancing Loop (B) for 'Clarity.' (Goal: Clear Plan) -> A Gap is created by a Confusing Idea -> Attempt to Gesture the Idea -> The Gesture is Awkward or Impossible -> The Idea's Flaw is Revealed -> The Idea is Refined -> The Gap closes.
Dramatically reduces the Delay between having a flawed idea and discovering the flaw.
The boundary of 'thinking' is explicitly extended to include the user's hands and body as part of the cognitive apparatus.
The goal is to achieve 'Structural Intuition.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Increases the stock of 'Potential for Flow State.'
Increases the inflow of 'Focused Work Sessions.'

The node is the variable 'Friction Reducer.' It calculates the optimal arrangement of the environment to minimize the cognitive cost of starting and sustaining work.

Acts as the Valve on the 'Inflow of Distractions.' The policy is: 'Proactively close this valve by turning off notifications and clearing the workspace before a deep work session begins.'
The 'Workspace Checklist' is the fixed parameter that guides the design of the environment.

Creates a Reinforcing Loop (R) for 'Productivity.' `Design a Good Environment -> Achieve Flow State More Easily -> Produce High-Quality Work -> Feel Good About the Work -> More Motivation to Design a Good Environment for the Next Session.`
Reduces the Delay (the 'activation energy') required to start a deep work session.
The boundary of the 'work system' is extended to include the user's desk, chair, and computer settings as critical, manageable components.
The goal is to create an 'Environment of Effortless Focus.'

systemsThinkingAnalysis.domainAgnosticDescription: Increases the stock of 'Audience Engagement' and 'Communicative Impact.'
